author: ಪ್ರಸನ್ನಕುಮಾರ
text:
We kannadigas oppose your statement towards Kannadigas Mr @NameisNani

We have the right to watch in #Kannada..
You r no one to decide that.. If you want to reach many Kannadigas you have to dub your movie.
Please don't believe the rumors that these unfaithful distributors spread https://t.co/lqagGGlM21

author: ಪ್ರಸನ್ನಕುಮಾರ
text:
Yes, we do hope #AAP will be better Alternative but you should always remember that there will be no tolerance towards #HindiImposition, #Centralisation, #DelhiCentricPolitics..

Be a #kannadiga when in #Karnataka.. https://t.co/4PynlRsKvi

author: ಪ್ರಸನ್ನಕುಮಾರ
text:
Came to Forum Mall Mysuru.

Tickets sold out for #Kannada version of #RRR

Its really true that there's really genuine demand for #DubbingInKannada 

Sad thing is people are forced to buy other versions tickets because there's shortage in demand.

#RRRInKannada 
#DubbingInKannada

author: ಪ್ರಸನ್ನಕುಮಾರ
text:
Watch in #Kannada instead.. You can learn your neighbor language at least..

And this version is the ORIGINAL..😍😀 https://t.co/RXTsed62SG

Bookings open first for the original and all other language's in our state except language of the land.!!!
